Label: util_TNC_TRANSIT_outbound_operating_cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_single_baseFare + df.kt_dacc_skims_out * driveSpeed / 60 * TNC_single_costPerMile + df.kt_dacc_skims_out * TNC_single_costPerMinute, TNC_single_costMinimum) * 100

Label: util_TNC_TRANSIT_inbound_Fare
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_single_baseFare + df.kt_degr_skims_inb * driveSpeed / 60 * TNC_single_costPerMile + df.kt_degr_skims_inb * TNC_single_costPerMinute, TNC_single_costMinimum) * 100

Label: util_TNC_Single_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_single_baseFare + df.s2_dist_skims * TNC_single_costPerMile + df.s2_time_skims * TNC_single_costPerMinute, TNC_single_costMinimum) * 100

Label: util_TNC_Shared_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_shared_baseFare + df.s2_dist_skims * TNC_shared_costPerMile + df.s2_time_skims * TNC_shared_costPerMinute, TNC_shared_costMinimum) * 100
